channel.title: Error Connecting to server
channel.description: Hi Guys, Everytime i trying connecting to my own server i get the same problem, error connecting to server i've tried using the ip which is 122.49.135.200 but it doesn't work. If you guys could try and help me i am using a Reaperscape source and i'm new to this stuff, thanks.

item.title: Error Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @allgofree allgofree
item.description:
@allgofree wrote:

Could someone else try and help me use and ip that other people can use, Xneonx tried hard but it didnt seem to work I am grateful that he tried so if anyone has ideas please comment.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

Sadly no, this only gives you the right to login on the server since 127.0.0.1 is the local host. If want me to show you how to host for others to join, send me a pm.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @allgofree allgofree
item.description:
@allgofree wrote:

Hey, it worked thanks alot does that mean if i give that to other people they can go on my server?

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

Set your server and client ip to 127.0.0.1 That should fix your problem right away. If it doesn’t, then please reply back so I can help you with your issue.

Read full topic
